name: D365SolutionExtractor
description: This task extracts a solution from Dynamics 365 and creates a Pull Request.
author: Dimaros B.V.

inputs.name: repositoryRoot
inputs.label: Repository Path
inputs.helpMarkDown: Sources path to be used to create a PR.

inputs.name: gitEmail
inputs.label: Git Email
inputs.helpMarkDown: Email to be used for a commit.

inputs.name: gitName
inputs.label: Git Name
inputs.helpMarkDown: Name to be used for a commit.

inputs.name: targetBranchName
inputs.label: Target Branch Name
inputs.helpMarkDown: Branch name to create a PR against.

inputs.name: newBranchName
inputs.label: New Branch Name
inputs.helpMarkDown: Branch name to create a PR from.

inputs.name: connectionString
inputs.label: Dataverse connection string
inputs.helpMarkDown: Dataverse connection string to be used.

inputs.name: connectionTimeoutInMinutes
inputs.label: Operation timeout (minutes)
inputs.helpMarkDown: Maximum number in minutes to wait before quitting the operation.

inputs.name: unpackFolder
inputs.label: Unpack Folder
inputs.helpMarkDown: Folder with in the repository to unpack solution to.
